title: Lands of sick and/or closed cotton textile mills:-With the previous approval of the Commissioner to
clause_text: Lands of sick and/or closed cotton textile mills:-With the previous approval of the Commissioner to a layout prepared for development or redevelopment of the entire open land and built-up area of a sick and/or closed cotton textile mill and on such conditions deemed appropriate and specified by him and as a part of a package of measures recommended by the Board of Industrial and Financial Reconstruction (BIFR) for the revival/rehabilitation of a potentially viable sick and/or closed mill, the Commissioner may allow:- For the same cotton textile or related uses subject to observance of all other Regulations;
section: Development or redevelopment of lands of cotton textile mills (mills).-
